title: Remembering Safe Spaces and Scary Places with Capturing Cambridge
description: A community drop-in event with Capturing Cambridge at the Museum of Cambridge as part of our History Festival. This theme was chosen specifically with the Encompass Safer Spaces campaign in mind. Come along to our safe space and share memories of where you or friends or family members have felt safe from or at risk of prejudice or abuse in Cambridge over the past 50 years.
